scripts.version:major: yarn workspaces run version:major && yarn version --no-git-tag-version --major
scripts.version:minor: yarn workspaces run version:minor && yarn version --no-git-tag-version --minor
scripts.version:patch: yarn workspaces run version:patch && yarn version --no-git-tag-version --patch
scripts.postversion: git add . && git commit -m v$npm_package_version && git tag v$npm_package_version -am v$npm_package_version
